subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ David Wright has hit well enough every game this season to keep his 25-game hitting streak alive, but he as only hit one home run with four RBI from the No. 5 spot in the order.
snippet: The Mets’ David Wright has hit well enough every game this season to keep his 25-game hitting streak alive, but he as only hit one home run with four RBI from the No. 5 spot in the order.
